column4: You probably get this a lot, but what the absolute simplest FTP server to set up if I wish to allow someone to temporarily have FTP access to a subdirectory on my server?
I just finished reading a How-To on ProFTPd
But it doens't quite fit what I want to do and I'm not smart enough to figure out how to mold that to my needs.
there's a GUI app for that in ubuntu as well
